title: Space Observation Tech Radar
subtitle: Space Observation Tech Radar for Downstream Science, Analytics, and Applications

entries.name: Python
entries.description: Default orchestration language for mission analysis pipelines and automation tooling.

entries.name: NumPy + SciPy
entries.description: Numerical foundation for orbit dynamics, calibration math, and simulation workloads.

entries.name: PostgreSQL + PostGIS
entries.description: Reliable mission data backbone for telemetry indexing, geospatial joins, and service APIs.

entries.name: Containerized Workloads
entries.description: Core packaging model for reproducible deployment of processing and operations services.

entries.name: Orekit
entries.description: Core orbit propagation and astrodynamics library used across mission tooling.

entries.name: CCSDS Specifications
entries.description: Interoperability baseline for telemetry, telecommand, and mission data exchange.

entries.name: Apache Arrow
entries.description: In-memory columnar format that speeds analytics and interchange in pipelines.

entries.name: Apache Parquet
entries.description: Long-term storage format for large mission and geospatial analytics datasets.

entries.name: JupyterLab
entries.description: Standard interactive environment for mission prototyping and data validation.

entries.name: Kubernetes
entries.description: Core control plane for scaling mission data and processing services.

entries.name: CI/CD Pipelines
entries.description: Automated build/test/deploy backbone for mission software reliability.

entries.name: Prometheus + Grafana
entries.description: Baseline observability stack for service health, telemetry, and alerting.

entries.name: Git
entries.description: Version-control foundation for flight software, ground systems, and configs.

entries.name: Linux
entries.description: Primary execution environment across mission operations and backend systems.

entries.name: Terraform
entries.description: Core infrastructure-as-code layer for reproducible mission platform environments.

entries.name: CesiumJS
entries.description: Core web engine for interactive 3D space and geospatial visualization.

entries.name: Orekit
entries.description: Robust orbital mechanics library for mission analysis and tracking.

entries.name: GMAT
entries.description: Open-source mission design and trajectory optimization toolkit.

entries.name: Open MCT
entries.description: Telemetry visualization platform for mission operations consoles.

entries.name: Legacy Desktop Flight Tools
entries.description: Retain only when migration risk outweighs modernization benefits.

entries.name: Constellation Revisit Optimization
entries.description: Optimize orbital planes and tasking windows for target revisit goals.

entries.name: SAR Interferometry (InSAR)
entries.description: High-value deformation monitoring technique across large regions.

entries.name: Onboard Edge AI Inference
entries.description: Run inference near the sensor to reduce downlink pressure and latency.

entries.name: Cross-Sensor Fusion Pipelines
entries.description: Fuse optical, SAR, and thermal feeds into unified analytic products.

entries.name: Manual-Only Mission Planning
entries.description: Avoid for modern constellations where scale requires automation.

entries.name: Sentinel-2 L2A
entries.description: Baseline multispectral data source for many EO production workflows.

entries.name: Landsat Collection 2
entries.description: Long-term calibrated archive for time-series analysis.

entries.name: PlanetScope Daily Imagery
entries.description: Commercial high-frequency imagery for near-daily monitoring use cases.

entries.name: SWOT Hydrology Products
entries.description: Emerging water-surface data products with strong scientific upside.

entries.name: Uncalibrated Third-Party Feeds
entries.description: Avoid for critical analytics unless provenance and calibration are verified.

entries.name: CCSDS Telemetry and Telecommand
entries.description: Core interoperability standard for spacecraft data and command exchange.

entries.name: STAC for EO Catalogs
entries.description: Consistent metadata pattern for discoverable Earth observation assets.

entries.name: OGC API - Processes
entries.description: Standardized API contract for geospatial processing services.

entries.name: ISO 19115 Metadata
entries.description: Well-established metadata model for geospatial datasets and lineage.

entries.name: Proprietary Tasking Schemas
entries.description: Use only when no open alternative can meet mission requirements.
